text: "You Rock My World" is a song by American singer Michael Jackson from his 2001 album Invincible. It's known for its catchy melody and smooth production, featuring themes of love and admiration. == Music video == The song also has a memorable music video that features a captivating storyline and showcases Jackson's iconic dance moves. The video is also known for featuring appearances of actors Chris Tucker, Marlon Brando, and Michael Madsen.
title: You Rock My World
